verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Moreover, <WH559> you shall tell the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> <WH376> 'Anyone of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the strangers <WH1616> who live as foreigners <WH1481> in Israel, <WH3478> who gives <WH5414> any of his seed <WH2233> to Molech; <WH4432> he shall surely <WH4191> be put to death. <WH4191> The people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> shall stone <WH7275> him with stones. <WH7275>

I also will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against that person, <WH376> and will cut him off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people <WH5971> because he has given <WH5414> of his seed <WH2233> to Molech, <WH4432> to defile <WH2930> my sanctuary, <WH4720> and to profane <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name. <WH8034>

If the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> all <WH5956> hide <WH5956> their eyes <WH5869> from that person, <WH376> when he gives <WH5414> of his seed <WH2233> to Molech, <WH4432> and don't <WH1115> put him to death; <WH4191>

then I will set <WH7760> my face <WH6440> against that man, <WH376> and against his family, <WH4940> and will cut him off, <WH3772> and all who play the prostitute <WH2181> after <WH310> him, <WH2181> to play the prostitute with Molech, <WH4432> from among <WH7130> their people. <WH5971>

<WH5315>"'The person that turns <WH6437> to <WH413> those who are mediums, <WH3049> and to <WH310> the wizards, <WH3049> to play the prostitute <WH2181> after <WH310> them, <WH5414> I will even set my face <WH6440> against that person, <WH5315> and will cut him off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>
<WH6942>"'Sanctify yourselves therefore, <WH6918> and be holy; for I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
You shall keep <WH8104> my statutes, <WH2708> and do <WH6213> them. <WH3068> I am Yahweh who sanctifies you. <WH6942>

<WH376>"'For everyone who curses <WH7043> his father <WH1> or his mother <WH517> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death: <WH4191> he has cursed <WH7043> his father <WH1> or his mother; <WH517> his blood shall be upon him. <WH1818>

<WH376>"'The man who commits adultery <WH5003> with another man <WH376>'s wife, <WH802> even he who commits adultery <WH5003> with his neighbor <WH7453>'s wife, <WH802> the adulterer <WH5003> and the adulteress <WH5003> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death. <WH4191>

<WH376>"'The man who lies <WH7901> with his father <WH1>'s wife <WH802> has uncovered <WH1540> his father <WH1>'s nakedness: <WH6172> both <WH8147> of them shall surely <WH4191> be put to death; <WH4191> their blood shall be upon them. <WH1818>

<WH376>"'If a man lies <WH7901> with his daughter-in <WH3618>-law, both <WH8147> of them shall surely <WH4191> be put to death: <WH4191> they have committed <WH6213> a perversion; <WH8397> their blood shall be upon them. <WH1818>

<WH376>"'If a man lies <WH7901> with a male, <WH2145> as with <WH4904> a woman, <WH802> both <WH8147> of them have committed <WH6213> an abomination: <WH8441> they shall surely <WH4191> be put to death; <WH4191> their blood shall be upon them. <WH1818>

<WH376>"'If a man takes <WH3947> a wife <WH802> and her mother, <WH517> it is wickedness: <WH2154> they shall be burned <WH8313> with fire, <WH784> both he and they; <WH2154> that there may be no wickedness among you. <WH8432>
<WH376>"'If a man lies <WH5414> with an animal, <WH929> he shall surely <WH4191> be put to death; <WH4191> and you shall kill <WH2026> the animal. <WH929>

<WH802>"'If a woman approaches <WH7126> any animal, <WH929> and lies down <WH7250> with it, <WH2026> you shall kill the woman, <WH802> and the animal: <WH929> they shall surely <WH4191> be put to death; <WH4191> their blood shall be upon them. <WH1818>

<WH376>"'If a man takes <WH3947> his sister, <WH269> his father <WH1>'s daughter, <WH1323> or <WH176> his mother <WH517>'s daughter, <WH1323> and sees <WH7200> her nakedness, <WH6172> and she sees <WH7200> his nakedness; <WH6172> it is a shameful thing; <WH2617> and they shall be cut off <WH3772> in the sight <WH5869> of the children of their people: <WH5971> he has uncovered <WH1540> his sister <WH269>'s nakedness; <WH6172> he shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity. <WH5771>

<WH376>"'If a man lies <WH7901> with a woman <WH802> having her monthly period, <WH1739> and uncovers <WH1540> her nakedness; <WH6172> he has made naked <WH6168> her fountain, <WH4726> and she has uncovered <WH6168> the fountain <WH4726> of her blood: <WH1818> and both <WH8147> of them shall be cut off <WH3772> from among <WH7130> their people. <WH5971>

<WH1540>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <WH6172> of your mother <WH517>'s sister, <WH269> nor of your father <WH1>'s sister; <WH269> for he has made naked <WH6168> his close relative: <WH7607> they shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity. <WH5771>

If a man <WH376> lies <WH7901> with his uncle <WH1733>'s wife, he has uncovered <WH1540> his uncle <WH1730>'s nakedness: <WH6172> they shall bear <WH5375> their sin; <WH2399> they shall die <WH4191> childless. <WH6185>
<WH376>"'If a man takes <WH3947> his brother <WH251>'s wife, <WH802> it is an impurity: <WH5079> he has uncovered <WH1540> his brother <WH251>'s nakedness; <WH6172> they shall be childless. <WH6185>

<WH8104>"'You shall therefore keep all my statutes, <WH2708> and all my ordinances, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them; <WH776> that the land, where I am bringing <WH935> you to dwell, <WH3427> may not vomit you out. <WH6958>

You shall not walk <WH3212> in the customs <WH2708> of the nation, <WH1471> which I am casting out <WH7971> before <WH6440> you: <WH6213> for they did all these things, <WH6973> and therefore I abhorred them.

But I have said <WH559> to you, <WH3423> "You shall inherit their land, <WH127> and I will give <WH5414> it to you to possess <WH3423> it, <WH776> a land flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>" I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> who has separated <WH914> you from the peoples. <WH5971>

<WH914>"'You shall therefore make a distinction between the clean <WH2889> animal <WH929> and the unclean, <WH2931> and between the unclean <WH2931> fowl <WH5775> and the clean: <WH2889> and you shall not make yourselves <WH5315> abominable <WH8262> by animal, <WH929> or by bird, <WH5775> or by anything with which <WH7430> the ground <WH127> teems, <WH914> which I have separated from you as unclean for you. <WH2930>
You shall be holy <WH6918> to me: <WH3068> for I, Yahweh, am holy, <WH6918> and have set <WH914> you apart from the peoples, <WH5971> that you should be mine.

<WH376>"'A man or a woman <WH802> that is <WH3588> a medium, <WH178> or is a wizard, <WH3049> shall surely <WH4191> be put to death: <WH4191> they shall stone <WH7275> them with stones; <WH7275> their blood shall be upon them. <WH1818>'"
